trans-unit.source: Provides a base control designer class for extending the design-mode behavior of a Web server control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class provides a base control designer class that can be inherited from and extended to provide design-time support for a Web server control in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase proporciona una clase de diseñador de control base que se puede heredar y ha ampliado para proporcionar compatibilidad en tiempo de diseño para un control de servidor Web en un host de diseño, como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The object model for working with design-time rendering is improved over earlier versions, with the following new base classes to provide access to the simplified object model:
trans-unit.target: El modelo de objetos para trabajar con la representación en tiempo de diseño se ha mejorado respecto a versiones anteriores, con las nuevas clases base siguientes para proporcionar acceso al modelo de objetos simplificado:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>, which is not new, but has been greatly improved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>, que no es nueva, pero se ha mejorado considerablemente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Automatic Formatting
trans-unit.target: Formato automático

trans-unit.source: You can create a variety of automatic and pre-defined formats that can simplify the process of page developers who are applying complex style changes to custom Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: Puede crear una variedad de formatos automáticos y predefinidos que puede simplificar el proceso de los desarrolladores de páginas que se va a aplicar cambios de estilo complejos a controles de servidor Web personalizados.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner> control, which derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class, provides many automatic formats from which to choose.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner> control, que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase, proporciona muchos formatos automáticos entre los que elegir.

trans-unit.source: To implement and provide automatic formatting in your custom controls, use the following features:
trans-unit.target: Para implementar y proporcionar formato automático en los controles personalizados, utilice las siguientes características:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle>.

trans-unit.source: Action Lists (Smart Tags)
trans-unit.target: Listas de acciones (etiquetas inteligentes)

trans-unit.source: Action lists are menus of important or widely used tasks that a page developer who uses a control can perform in a design-time user interface (UI), such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Listas de acciones son menús de tareas importantes o ampliamente utilizados que un desarrollador de páginas que utiliza un control puede realizar en una interfaz de usuario de tiempo de diseño (IU), como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For example, the design-time view of your control could provide a menu of available tasks.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, la vista en tiempo de diseño del control podría proporcionar un menú de tareas disponibles.

trans-unit.source: This includes a task to format the control automatically.
trans-unit.target: Esto incluye una tarea para dar formato al control automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: To learn about action lists, start with the following features:
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información acerca de las listas de acción, empiece con las siguientes características:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> class.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> class.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem>.

trans-unit.source: Control Designer Regions
trans-unit.target: Regiones del Diseñador de controles

trans-unit.source: Regions are editable areas in the design-time view of a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Las regiones son las áreas modificables en la vista en tiempo de diseño de un control de servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: This feature offers WYSIWYG-like editing of the template content, inner controls, and properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Esta característica ofrece edición de tipo WYSIWYG de controles internos, propiedades y el contenido de la plantilla en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: You can have the control designer create controls in regions or you can use the Toolbox to drag and drop controls into regions.
trans-unit.target: Puede hacer que el Diseñador de controles cree controles en regiones o puede usar el cuadro de herramientas para arrastrar y colocar controles en regiones.

trans-unit.source: Regions are managed with the following features:
trans-unit.target: Las regiones se administran con las siguientes características:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Templates
trans-unit.target: Plantillas

trans-unit.source: The model for creating a UI for design-time editing of templated controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, has been greatly improved from earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: El modelo para crear una interfaz de usuario de edición en tiempo de diseño de controles con plantilla, como la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> de control, se ha mejorado en gran medida de las versiones anteriores.

trans-unit.source: You can create complex custom controls that include templates for various parts of the control, and your custom control designer can help page developers who are modifying templates with the following features:
trans-unit.target: Puede crear controles personalizados complejos que incluyan plantillas para diversas partes del control y el Diseñador de controles personalizados puede ayudar a los desarrolladores de páginas que se va a modificar plantillas con las siguientes características:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>.

trans-unit.source: Design-Time Rendering
trans-unit.target: Representación en tiempo de diseño

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class has the following methods to support design-time rendering of the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase tiene los siguientes métodos para admitir la representación en tiempo de diseño del control de servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: Most of these methods are the same as in earlier versions:
trans-unit.target: La mayoría de estos métodos es los mismos que en versiones anteriores:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple designer class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo crear una clase simple de diseñador que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: This control designer supports a custom `TextControl` class and provides a command to change the text size of a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Este diseñador de controles admite un personalizado `TextControl` clase y proporciona un comando para cambiar el tamaño del texto de un control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The control designer is associated with the control by specifying the control designer in a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> object declaration on the `TextControl` class.
trans-unit.target: El Diseñador de control está asociado con el control especificando el Diseñador de controles en un <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> declaración del objeto en el `TextControl` clase.

trans-unit.source: The key to persisting property changes from the control designer to the HTML markup is found in the `ToggleTextSize` method of the custom `ActionList` class.
trans-unit.target: La clave para guardar cambios de las propiedades del Diseñador de controles para el marcado HTML se encuentra en la `ToggleTextSize` método personalizado `ActionList` clase.

trans-unit.source: To try the example, add a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly and compile the code.
trans-unit.target: Para probar el ejemplo, agregue una referencia al ensamblado System.Design.dll y compile el código.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> class.
Gets the action list collection for the control designer.
A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> items for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> que contiene los elementos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> del diseñador de controles.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, together with properties to set the Text properties on both internal controls, and also the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo crear un control compuesto simple con un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> y un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> (control), junto con las propiedades para establecer las propiedades de texto en ambos controles internos y también el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> propiedades de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.

trans-unit.source: An associated control designer class creates three <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> commands, each of which sets two properties on the control, and can be rolled back with the undo functionality of the design host.
trans-unit.target: Una clase de diseñador de controles asociada crea tres <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> comandos, cada uno de los cuales establece dos propiedades en el control y se pueden revertir con la funcionalidad de deshacer del host de diseño.

trans-unit.source: To add an action list menu to a custom control in design view, your custom control designer must override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ActionLists" /> property to return a custom control class that is derived from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Para agregar un menú de la lista de acciones en un control personalizado en la vista Diseño, el Diseñador de control personalizado debe reemplazar la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ActionLists" /> propiedad para devolver una clase de control personalizado que se deriva de la <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> clase.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can be resized in the design-time environment.
<see langword="true" />, if the control can be resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, si el control puede cambiar de tamaño; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AllowResize%2A> property in a custom control designer class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AllowResize%2A> propiedad en una clase de diseñador de control personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AllowResize" /> property in derived classes to enable or disable page developers from resizing your control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Use la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AllowResize" /> propiedad en clases derivadas para habilitar o deshabilitar los desarrolladores de páginas en el tamaño del control en el host de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object that contains the predefined schemes for the control.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> que contiene los esquemas predefinidos del control.

trans-unit.source: A complete Web server control includes not only the control, but also, possibly, a corresponding control designer class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class and a formatting class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: Un control de servidor Web completando incluye no sólo el control, pero además, posiblemente, su correspondiente controlar la clase de diseñador que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase y un formato que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property is a collection of instances of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> propiedad es una colección de instancias de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> clase.

trans-unit.source: For a working example of automatic formatting in [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de formato automático en [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property in a custom control designer.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo implementar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> propiedad en un diseñador de controles personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The derived control designer implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property by adding three instances of a custom automatic format that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: Implementa el Diseñador de control derivado el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> propiedad agregando tres instancias de un formato automático personalizado que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> clase.

trans-unit.source: Controls that automatically expose AutoFormats get a task list and context commands for their formats.
trans-unit.target: Controles que exponen automáticamente autoformatos tarea de obtención de una lista y comandos de contexto para sus formatos.

trans-unit.source: When you are using automatic formats, use the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl" /> property to set the properties in your callback function.
trans-unit.target: Cuando esté utilizando formatos automáticos, use la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl" /> propiedad para establecer las propiedades en la función de devolución de llamada.

trans-unit.source: Creates HTML markup to display an error message at design time.
The error message to include in the generated HTML markup.
Creates HTML markup to display a specified error message at design time.
An HTML markup string that contains the specified error message.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to create HTML markup to display an error message for a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para crear el formato HTML para mostrar un mensaje de error para un control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The value for `errorMessage` specifies a localized string that is displayed to the user of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: El valor de `errorMessage` especifica una cadena localizada que se muestra al usuario del control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns a table with two rows, as follows:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> implementación de la clase de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> método devuelve una tabla con dos filas, como se indica a continuación:

trans-unit.source: The first row contains the type name and site name for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: La primera fila contiene el nombre de tipo y nombre de sitio para el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The second row contains the input error message string.
trans-unit.target: La segunda fila contiene la cadena de mensaje de error en la entrada.

trans-unit.source: To generate HTML markup for an error message with an associated exception, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%2CSystem.Exception%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: Para generar el marcado HTML para un mensaje de error con una excepción asociada, utilice el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%2CSystem.Exception%29> de sobrecarga.

trans-unit.source: To generate HTML markup for an exception without specifying a localized error message, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para generar el marcado HTML para una excepción sin especificar un mensaje de error localizado, use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String)" /> overload is functionally equivalent to calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String,System.Exception)" /> method with e set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String)" /> sobrecarga es funcionalmente equivalente a llamar a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String,System.Exception)" /> método con e establecido en <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The error message to include in the generated HTML string.
The exception to include in the generated HTML string.
Creates the HTML markup to display a specified exception error message at design time.
HTML markup that contains the specified <paramref name="errorMessage" /> and <paramref name="e" />.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to provide simple HTML markup that can be used to display error and exception details for a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para proporcionar un formato HTML simple que puede usarse para mostrar los detalles de error y excepción para un control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The value for `errorMessage` specifies a localized string that is displayed to the user of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: El valor de `errorMessage` especifica una cadena localizada que se muestra al usuario del control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns a table with two rows, as follows:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> implementación de la clase de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> método devuelve una tabla con dos filas, como se indica a continuación:

trans-unit.source: The first row contains the type name and site name for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: La primera fila contiene el nombre de tipo y nombre de sitio para el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The second row contains the input error message and the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> string of the exception.
trans-unit.target: La segunda fila contiene el mensaje de error en la entrada y la <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> cadena de la excepción.

trans-unit.source: To generate HTML markup for an error message without specifying an exception, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: Para generar el marcado HTML para un mensaje de error sin especificar una excepción, use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29> sobrecarga.

trans-unit.source: To generate HTML markup for an exception without specifying a localized error message, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para generar el marcado HTML para una excepción sin especificar un mensaje de error localizado, use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String,System.Exception)" /> method should be called from the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetViewRendering" /> or <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> method when exceptions occur.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreateErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.String,System.Exception)" /> método debe llamarse desde el <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetViewRendering" /> o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> método cuando se producen excepciones.

trans-unit.source: Provides a simple rectangular placeholder representation that displays the type and ID of the control.

The typical design pattern is to try to get HTML markup through the associated control, and then if an error is encountered, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: El modelo de diseño típico es intentar obtener el marcado HTML mediante el control asociado y, a continuación, si se produce un error, llame a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: If no markup is returned by the control, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which if it is not overridden to provide specific markup, calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which should contain information about the type and ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: Si el control no devuelve ningún tipo de marcado, llame a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> método, que si no se invalida para proporcionar un código específico, llama a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> método, que debe contener información sobre el tipo y el identificador del control.

trans-unit.source: Provides a simple rectangular placeholder representation that displays the type and ID of the control.
A string that contains design-time HTML markup providing basic information about the control.

The typical design pattern is to try to get HTML markup through the associated control, and then if an error is encountered, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: El modelo de diseño típico es intentar obtener el marcado HTML mediante el control asociado y, a continuación, si se produce un error, llame a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: If no markup is returned by the control, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which if it is not overridden to provide specific markup, calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which should contain information about the type and ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: Si el control no devuelve ningún tipo de marcado, llame a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> método, que si no se invalida para proporcionar un código específico, llama a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> método, que debe contener información sobre el tipo y el identificador del control.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains text and markup to add to the HTML output.
Provides a simple rectangular placeholder representation that displays the type and ID of the control, and also additional specified instructions or information.
A string that contains design-time HTML markup providing information about the control.
The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a templated control designer.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método en un diseñador de controles con plantilla.

trans-unit.source: A string is then passed as the `instruction` parameter in a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A> method, which provides the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, se pasa una cadena como el `instruction` parámetro en una llamada a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A> método, que proporciona el formato HTML en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The typical design pattern is to try to get HTML markup through the associated control, and then if an error is encountered, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: El modelo de diseño típico es intentar obtener el marcado HTML mediante el control asociado y, a continuación, si se produce un error, llame a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: If no markup is returned by the control, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which if it is not overridden to provide specific markup, calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which should contain information about the type and ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: Si el control no devuelve ningún tipo de marcado, llame a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> método, que si no se invalida para proporcionar un código específico, llama a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> método, que debe contener información sobre el tipo y el identificador del control.

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the associated control for viewing or rendering on the design surface.
A Web server control.
Gets a value indicating whether data binding is supported by the containing region for the associated control.
<see langword="true" />, if the container for the control supports data binding; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, si el contenedor para el control admite el enlace de datos; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that is used to persist data for the associated control at design time.

A <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState" /> property that implements <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> and uses the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDesignerStateService" /> to persist state data for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState" /> propiedad que implementa <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> y utiliza el <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDesignerStateService" /> para conservar los datos de estado para el control asociado en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> property are persisted even if the user switches from Design to Source view, or reloads the document, or closes and reopens the design host.
trans-unit.target: Los valores para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> propiedad persisten incluso si el usuario cambia de diseño a la vista de origen, o vuelve a cargar el documento, o se cierra y vuelve a abrir el host de diseño.

trans-unit.source: You can get and set values in the returned object as you would in an IDictionary object, with the values automatically persisted.
trans-unit.target: Puede obtener y establecer valores en el objeto devuelto como lo haría en un IDictionary de objeto, con los valores guardados automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the view-control object for the control designer.
<see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeElementView%2A> property is obsolete and there is no replacement for the functionality.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeElementView%2A> propiedad está obsoleta y no hay ningún reemplazo para la funcionalidad.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the design host must finish loading before the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> method can be called.

<see langword="true" />, if loading must be complete before the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> method can be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, si la carga debe cumplirse antes de la <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> método se puede llamar; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: De manera predeterminada, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A> propiedad devuelve `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A> property is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A> está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> method for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> método para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the coordinates of the rectangle representing the boundaries for the control as displayed on the design surface.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> object representing the boundaries for the control on the design surface relative to the control, not the document.
Retrieves the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
Retrieves the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
The HTML markup used to represent the control at design time.
The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a custom control designer.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método en un diseñador de controles personalizados.

trans-unit.source: If the Text property for the associated control is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si la propiedad de texto para el control asociado está vacía, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> llamadas al método el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method creates and renders a Hyperlink control.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método crea y representa un control de hipervínculo.

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a custom container control, make sure that you render the control and all child controls at design time, regardless of whether the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible" /> property is set to <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Si va a crear un control contenedor personalizado, asegúrese de que representará el control y todos los controles secundarios en tiempo de diseño, independientemente de si la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible" /> propiedad está establecida en <see langword="true" /> o <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of control designer regions for the associated control.
Retrieves the HTML markup to display the control and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.
The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, including all control designer regions.
The design host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to get the design-time HTML markup and the current list of control designer regions.
trans-unit.target: El host de diseño llama el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para obtener el marcado HTML en tiempo de diseño y la lista actual de control de las regiones del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Using the DesignerRegionCollection, the design host can then request the markup for each editable control designer region.
trans-unit.target: Con DesignerRegionCollection, el host de diseño puede solicitar el marcado de cada región de diseñador de control que puede modificar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method is provided for a derived control designer, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> class, that must process the content for the region before calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método se proporciona para un diseñador de controles derivado, como la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> (clase), que debe procesar el contenido de la región antes de llamar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create HTML markup using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo crear marcado HTML a través del <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> colección.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> object that can retrieve global and local services.
Returns an appropriate resource provider factory, depending on the globalization settings in the configuration file for the site.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory" /> object, if any are defined in the configuration file; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.

A resource provider factory creates resource providers and resource writers, depending on the current settings in the system.web/globalization section of the configuration file (either the Machine.config or Web.config files for both global and local resources).
trans-unit.target: Un generador de proveedores de recursos crea proveedores de recursos y los escritores de recursos, según la configuración actual en la sección System.Web/Globalization del archivo de configuración (archivos del archivo Machine.config o Web.config para los recursos globales y locales).

trans-unit.source: If no globalization settings are found, the `serviceProvider` parameter is used to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory> object using the default implementation for the design host.
trans-unit.target: Si no se encuentra ninguna configuración de globalización, la `serviceProvider` parámetro se utiliza para crear un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory> objeto mediante la implementación predeterminada para el host de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Typically, control developers will not override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeResourceProviderFactory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, los programadores de controles no invalidará el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeResourceProviderFactory%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> object to get content for.
Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the associated control.
The persisted content for the region, if the control designer supports editable regions; otherwise, an empty string ("").
The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method returns an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> método devuelve una cadena vacía ("").

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class can support region-based editing on the design surface and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method to return the content for a specified region.
trans-unit.target: Las clases que derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase admiten la edición basada en la región en la superficie de diseño y reemplazan el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> método para devolver el contenido de una región especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to get a reference to the design host, and then use the reference to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser> object that creates the HTML markup for `region` and its contents.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo obtener una referencia al host de diseño y, a continuación, usar dicha referencia para crear un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser> objeto que crea el marcado HTML de `region` y su contenido.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup to represent a Web server control at design time that will have no visual representation at run time.
The HTML markup used to represent a control at design time that would otherwise have no visual representation.
The default is a rectangle that contains the type and ID of the component.
The default behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method is to return a string that contains the name of the component.
trans-unit.target: El comportamiento predeterminado de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> método consiste en devolver una cadena que contiene el nombre del componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method should be called in the implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method when there is no design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> método debe llamarse en la implementación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método cuando no hay ningún formato HTML en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a custom control designer.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método en un diseñador de controles personalizados.

trans-unit.source: If the `Text` property for the associated control is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si el `Text` propiedad para el control asociado está vacía, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> llamadas al método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method creates and renders a `Hyperlink` control.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método crea y representa un `Hyperlink` control.

trans-unit.source: The exception that occurred.
Retrieves the HTML markup that provides information about the specified exception.
The design-time HTML markup for the specified exception.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method is typically called, if an exception is thrown in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> método se llama normalmente, si se produce una excepción el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to generate design-time HTML markup for the control when an error occurs and call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo generar marcado HTML en tiempo de diseño para el control cuando se produce un error y llame al método el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The typical design pattern is to try to get HTML markup through the associated control, and then if an error is encountered, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: El modelo de diseño típico es intentar obtener el marcado HTML mediante el control asociado y, a continuación, si se produce un error, llame a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(System.Exception)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: If no markup is returned by the control, call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which if it is not overridden to provide specific markup, calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> method, which should contain information about the type and ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: Si el control no devuelve ningún tipo de marcado, llame a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> método, que si no se invalida para proporcionar un código específico, llama a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml" /> método, que debe contener información sobre el tipo y el identificador del control.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the persistable inner HTML markup of the control at design time.
A string representing the persistable inner HTML markup for the associated control.
The default is <see langword="null" />.
Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistenceContent" /> method to provide custom handling of the inner content persistence for the design host.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistenceContent" /> método para proporcionar control personalizado de la persistencia del contenido interno para el host de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the persistable inner HTML markup of the control.
The persistable inner HTML markup of the control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistInnerHtml%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistInnerHtml%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistenceContent%2A> method for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetPersistenceContent%2A> método para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an object that contains the design-time markup for the content and regions of the associated control.
Retrieves an object that contains the design-time markup for the content and regions of the associated control.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object.
Retrieves an object that contains the design-time markup for the content and regions of the specified control.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> object.
A control designer that derives from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" />.
Retrieves an object that contains the design-time markup for the content and regions of the associated control for the specified control designer.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> object.
Gets a value indicating whether the properties of the associated control are hidden when the control is in template mode.
<see langword="true" />, if the properties of the associated control are hidden when the control is in template mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, si las propiedades del control asociado están ocultas cuando el control está en modo de plantilla; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: De manera predeterminada, es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The ID property is never hidden.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad ID nunca está oculta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.HidePropertiesInTemplateMode%2A> property to determine whether properties, other than the ID property, should be hidden from the property grids while the control is in template editing mode.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método usa la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.HidePropertiesInTemplateMode%2A> propiedad para determinar si las propiedades distintas de la propiedad ID, deben ocultarse de la cuadrícula de propiedades mientras el control está en modo de edición de plantillas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID string for the control.
The ID string for the control.
trans-unit.target: La cadena de identificador para el control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ID%2A> property is used internally within the control designer and for interaction with the Properties window.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ID%2A> propiedad se utiliza internamente en el Diseñador de control y para la interacción con la ventana Propiedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ID%2A> property shadows the run-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ID%2A> propiedad prevalece sobre el tiempo de ejecución <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The control being designed.
Initializes the control designer and loads the specified component.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method is called by the design host to complete the following actions:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método se llama por el host de diseño para completar las acciones siguientes:

trans-unit.source: Load the control designer with the component to design.
trans-unit.target: Cargar el Diseñador de control con el componente a diseñar.

trans-unit.source: Set up the view on the control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Preparar la vista en el control mediante la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the associated control is of the right type.
trans-unit.target: Compruebe que el control asociado es del tipo correcto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a control class and a control designer class that override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method to initialize internal variables.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar una clase de control y una clase de diseñador de controles que invalide la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método para inicializar las variables internas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is in either template viewing or editing mode in the design host.
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode" /> property is read-only.
<see langword="true" />, if the control is in either template viewing or editing mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, si el control está en la vista o modo; de edición de plantilla en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A Web server control is in template mode when a read-only template is currently being viewed or an editable template is being edited in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Un control de servidor Web está en modo de plantilla cuando se está viendo una plantilla de solo lectura o está editando una plantilla modificable en un host de diseño como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> object to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> value when the template mode changes for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase proporciona un valor predeterminado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> objeto que se va a actualizar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> valor cuando cambia el modo de plantilla para el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Los diseñadores personalizados que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> clase puede invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> método para realizar un procesamiento adicional cuando lo cambios de modo de un control en el host de diseño de la edición de plantillas.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the control as displayed on the design surface and causes the design host to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method.
Calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> method also calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Al llamar a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> método también llama <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the whole area of the control that is displayed on the design surface and signals the control designer to redraw the control.

To enable the control designer to handle paint events, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para habilitar el Diseñador de control controlar los eventos de pintura, use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> método en el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A> method provides the design host with a way to instruct the control designer to redraw the control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A> método proporciona una manera de indicar al diseñador de control para volver a dibujar el control en el host de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Essentially, this is the same as calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> method, because it causes the whole control to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: En esencia, esto equivale a llamar a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> método, porque hace que se vuelvan a dibujar todo el control.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> object that represents the area to invalidate, relative to the upper-left corner of the control.
Invalidates the specified area of the control that is displayed on the design surface and signals the control designer to redraw the control.

To enable the control designer to handle paint events, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para habilitar el Diseñador de control controlar los eventos de pintura, use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> método en el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A> method provides the design host with a way to instruct the control designer to redraw a specific part of the control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Invalidate%2A> método proporciona el host de diseño una manera de indicar al diseñador de control para volver a dibujar una parte específica del control.

trans-unit.source: Wraps a series of changes into a transaction, using the specified parameters that can be rolled back as a unit with the undo functionality of the design host.
The control associated with the control designer.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback" /> object representing a function to call in the control designer as part of the transaction.
An object that contains the argument for callback.
A description of the effect of allowing the transaction to complete, which is used by the design host to give the user an opportunity to cancel the transaction.
Wraps a series of changes into a transaction, using the specified parameters that can be rolled back as a unit with the undo functionality of the design host.

The implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method notifies the design host, which is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> property of `component`, that a change is occurring in the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context`, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed.
trans-unit.target: La implementación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> método notifica al host de diseño, que viene determinado por la <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> propiedad de `component`, un cambio que se está produciendo en el control asociado y, si el cambio no se ha cancelado por el host de diseño, se invoca especificado `callback` utilizando los `context`y, a continuación, notifica al host de diseño que se ha completado el cambio.

trans-unit.source: If the design host or the associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException> exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`.
trans-unit.target: Si el host de diseño o el control asociado inicia un estático `Canceled` campo de excepción de un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException> excepción, la transacción se cancela sin invocar `callback`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, together with properties to set the label text, and also the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo crear un control compuesto simple con un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> y un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> (control), junto con las propiedades para establecer el texto de etiqueta y también el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>, y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> propiedades de el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.

trans-unit.source: An associated control designer class creates three <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> commands, each of which sets two properties on the control.
trans-unit.target: Una clase de diseñador de controles asociada crea tres <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> comandos, cada uno de los cuales establece dos propiedades en el control.

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, you can use the undo functionality of the design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], to roll back each completed transaction as a unit.
trans-unit.target: Mediante el uso de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> método, puede usar la funcionalidad de deshacer del host de diseño, como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], para revertir cada transacción completada como una unidad.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="callback" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The control associated with the control designer.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback" /> object representing a function to call in the control designer as part of the transaction.
An object that contains the argument for callback.
A description of the effect of allowing the transaction to complete, which is used by the design host to give the user an opportunity to cancel the transaction.

A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor" /> object (typically, either an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" /> or a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> object) that describes the member of the associated control that is being invoked as part of the transaction.
Wraps a series of changes into a transaction, using the specified parameters that can be rolled back as a unit with the undo functionality of the design host.

The implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method notifies the design host, which is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> property of `component`, that a change is occurring to the specified `member` (property or method) of the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context` as the argument, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed.
trans-unit.target: La implementación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> método notifica al host de diseño, que viene determinado por la <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> propiedad de `component`, que se está produciendo un cambio a los especificados `member` (propiedad o método) del control asociado y, si el cambio no se cancela el host de diseño, se invoca el especificado `callback` mediante especificado `context` como argumento y, a continuación, notifica al host de diseño que se ha completado el cambio.

trans-unit.source: If the design host or associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException> exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`.
trans-unit.target: Si el host de diseño o el control asociado inicia un estático `Canceled` campo de excepción de un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException> excepción, la transacción se cancela sin invocar `callback`.

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de código, vea <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.String%29>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="callback" /> is <see langword="null" />.
An <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> object representing the design host that provides control designer services for the associated control.
The control associated with the control designer.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TransactedChangeCallback" /> object representing a function to call in the control designer as part of the transaction.
An object that contains the argument for callback.
A description of the effect of allowing the transaction to complete, which is used by the design host to give the user an opportunity to cancel the transaction.

A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor" /> object (typically either an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" /> or a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> object) that describes the member of the associated control that is being invoked as part of the transaction.
Wraps a series of changes into a transaction, using the specified parameters that can be rolled back as a unit with the undo functionality of the design host.

The implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method notifies the design host, which is represented by `serviceProvider`, that a change is occurring to the specified `member` (property or method) of the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context` as the argument, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed.
trans-unit.target: La implementación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> método notifica al host de diseño, que se representa mediante `serviceProvider`, que se está produciendo un cambio a los especificados `member` (propiedad o método) del control asociado y, si el cambio no se cancela el host de diseño, se invoca especificado `callback` mediante especificado `context` como argumento y, a continuación, notifica al host de diseño que se ha completado el cambio.

trans-unit.source: If the design host or the associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException> exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`.
trans-unit.target: Si el host de diseño o el control asociado inicia un estático `Canceled` campo de excepción de un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException> excepción, la transacción se cancela sin invocar `callback`.

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de código, vea <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="callback" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="serviceProvider" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Web server control has been marked as changed.
<see langword="true" />, if the Web server control has changed since it was last persisted or loaded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, si el control de servidor Web ha cambiado desde su última persistente o cargado; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.IsDirty%2A> property is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.IsDirty%2A> está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.IsDirty%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetDirty%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.IsDirty%2A> propiedad y el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetDirty%2A> método en el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> propiedad para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The property to test for data binding.
Retrieves a value indicating whether the specified property on the associated control is data-bound.
<see langword="true" />, if the property is data-bound; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.IsPropertyBound%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.IsPropertyBound%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Contains%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DataBindings%2A> property for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Contains%2A> método en el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DataBindings%2A> propiedad para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.

trans-unit.source: An object derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDesignTimeResourceWriter" /> object that is used to write resources into the design-time response stream.
Uses the provided resource writer to persist the localizable properties of the associated control to a resource in the design host.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Localize%2A> method is called by the design host to create resource entries for each property that is marked with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> object and any properties that use an explicit resource expression as a value.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Localize%2A> método se llama por el host de diseño para crear entradas de recursos para cada propiedad que se marca con un <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> objeto y las propiedades que utilice una expresión de recurso explícita como un valor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> object that defines a style.
Called when a predefined, automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called after a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object has applied a predefined format to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> método se llama después de un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> objeto aplica un formato predefinido para el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines the automatic formatting scheme name and style settings that are applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> objeto define el formato automático esquema estilo y el nombre de configuración que se aplica al control.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method to perform additional processing when an automatic formatting scheme is applied to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Las clases que derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase invalidación el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> método para realizar un procesamiento adicional cuando se aplica una combinación de formato automática para el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The property to test for changes in its bindings collection.
Called when the data-binding collection changes.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A> method is called when the data-binding collection has been changed by an external caller.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A> método se llama cuando un llamador externo ha cambiado la colección de enlace de datos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnBindingsCollectionChanged%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Changed> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DataBindings%2A> collection for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Changed> evento en el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.DataBindings%2A> colección para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs" /> object that specifies the location and, possibly, the control designer region that the user clicked.
Called by the design host when the user clicks the associated control at design time.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the design host for certain actions on a control in the design surface.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> evento es desencadenado por el host de diseño para determinadas acciones en un control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised for the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, un evento se desencadena para las condiciones siguientes:

trans-unit.source: The user clicks the control.
trans-unit.target: El usuario hace clic en el control.

trans-unit.source: The control designer paints on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: El Diseñador de controles dibuja en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The user enters or exits template editing mode for the control.
trans-unit.target: El usuario entra o sale del modo para el control de edición de plantillas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase proporciona un delegado predeterminado para controlar la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to process events that are raised when the user clicks a control.
trans-unit.target: Clases derivadas de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> invalidar la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> método para procesar los eventos que se producen cuando el usuario hace clic en un control.
