trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> método permite que las clases derivadas controlen el evento sin adjuntar ningún delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ésta es la técnica preferida para controlar el evento en una clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method returns without performing any processing.
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> método devuelve sin realizar ningún procesamiento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> event in a clickable region of the control and use a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object to identify the region that is being clicked.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar un controlador para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> eventos en una región donde hacer clic del control y use un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> objeto para identificar la región que se hace clic en.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo más extenso de código para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> clase.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs)" /> method in a class deriving from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> class to handle design-time click events on the control.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs)" /> método en una clase derivada de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> clase para administrar el tiempo de diseño, haga clic en eventos en el control.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="e" /> is not null, the clicked region, if any, is specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Si <paramref name="e" /> no es nulo, la región donde ha hecho clic, si los hay, se especifica en el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region" /> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
Called when the associated control changes.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when a property on the associated control is changed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método se llama cuando se cambia una propiedad en el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: It allows the implementer to do any processing that might be required after a property change.
trans-unit.target: Permite al implementador hacer cualquier procesamiento que podría ser necesario después de un cambio de propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method causes the design host to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Llamar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método hace que el host de diseño llamar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method also persists the control in the page markup.
trans-unit.target: La implementación base de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método también conserva el control en el marcado de la página.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> method to provide additional processing before persisting the control and before refreshing the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> método para proporcionar un procesamiento adicional antes de guardar el control y antes de actualizar el formato HTML en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, make sure that you call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> método en una clase derivada, asegúrese de llamar a la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs)" /> método de la clase base para que los delegados registrados reciban el evento.

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging" /> event for the associated control.

When either the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Localize%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> event occurs before any changes are made to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Cuando tanto el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Localize%2A> método se llama, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> evento tiene lugar antes de que los cambios se realizan en el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: After the changes are complete, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method occurs.
trans-unit.target: Después de que los cambios están completos, la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> se produce el método.

trans-unit.source: Called when the associated Web server control has been resized in the design host at design time.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize%2A> method typically is called only by the design-time environment when a user action causes the associated Web server control to be resized.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize%2A> método normalmente se llama solo por el entorno en tiempo de diseño cuando el control de servidor Web asociado para cambiar de tamaño da lugar a una acción del usuario.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize%2A> method might be called several times during a resizing process to display the updated size of the control before the resizing is completed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize%2A> método puede llamarse varias veces durante un proceso de cambio de tamaño para mostrar el tamaño actualizado del control antes de que se complete el cambio de tamaño.

trans-unit.source: The width and height properties of the control are updated before the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Las propiedades de ancho y alto del control se actualizan antes de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize%2A> se llama al método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> object that specifies the graphics and rectangle boundaries used to draw the control.
Called when the control designer draws the associated control on the design surface, if the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags.CustomPaint" /> value is <see langword="true" />.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the design host for certain actions on a control in the design surface.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> evento es desencadenado por el host de diseño para determinadas acciones en un control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised for the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, un evento se desencadena para las condiciones siguientes:

trans-unit.source: The user clicks the control.
trans-unit.target: El usuario hace clic en el control.

trans-unit.source: The design host requests HTML markup to render the associated control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: El diseño host solicita el formato HTML para representar el control asociado en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The user enters or exits template editing mode for the control.
trans-unit.target: El usuario entra o sale del modo para el control de edición de plantillas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase proporciona un delegado predeterminado para controlar la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> should set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags.CustomPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> value and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method to process events that are raised when the design host draws the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Clases derivadas de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> debe establecer el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags.CustomPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> valor e invalide el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> método para procesar los eventos que se producen cuando el host de diseño dibuja el control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> método permite que las clases derivadas controlen el evento sin adjuntar ningún delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ésta es la técnica preferida para controlar el evento en una clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method returns without performing any processing.
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> método devuelve sin realizar ningún procesamiento.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method in a class deriving from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> class to handle paint events for a control in the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> método en una clase derivada de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> clase para controlar los eventos de dibujo de un control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: However, the event occurs only if the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags.CustomPaint" /> value has been set with the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags(System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, el evento sólo se produce si el <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags.CustomPaint" /> se ha establecido el valor con el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags(System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags,System.Boolean)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: The properties for the class of the component.
Adds properties to or removes properties from the Properties grid in a design host at design time or provides new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.

With the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method, you can add items to the dictionary of properties that a control designer exposes through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: Con el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método, puede agregar elementos al diccionario de propiedades que un diseñador de controles que se expone a través de un <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of properties are the names of the properties.
trans-unit.target: Las claves del diccionario de propiedades son los nombres de las propiedades.

trans-unit.source: The objects are of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Los objetos son del tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.

trans-unit.source: You can directly modify the dictionary that is accessible through the properties parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Puede modificar directamente el diccionario que sea accesible a través del parámetro de propiedades, o puede dejar sin cambios.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.
trans-unit.target: Si invalida el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método, llame a la implementación base antes de realizar su propio filtrado.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnControlResize" /> event.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RaiseResizeEvent%2A> method is obsolete and there is no replacement for this feature.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RaiseResizeEvent%2A> método está obsoleto y no hay ningún reemplazo para esta característica.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the properties of the control are read-only at design time.
<see langword="true" />, if the properties of the control are read-only at design time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, si las propiedades del control son de solo lectura en tiempo de diseño; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class is read-only, by nature.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase es de solo lectura, por naturaleza.

trans-unit.source: Read/write features are provided by adding a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object or using base classes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Características de lectura/escritura se proporcionan mediante la adición de un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> objeto o clases base, como el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ReadOnly%2A> property is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ReadOnly%2A> está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class to which you can add editable designer regions or from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> object to which you can create editable designer regions in templates.
trans-unit.target: Se deriva el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> clase a la que puede agregar regiones del diseñador modificables o desde el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> objeto al que se pueden crear regiones del diseñador modificables en plantillas.

trans-unit.source: The control associated with the control designer.
The cloned copy of the associated control.
Registers internal data in a cloned control.
Whenever an item is cloned, there might be some internal data structures, such as `meta:` attributes, that should be included in the cloned control by the control designer.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que se clona un elemento, puede haber algunas estructuras de datos internas, como `meta:` atributos, que deben incluirse en el control clonado mediante el Diseñador de controles.

trans-unit.source: A page developer might add `meta:` attributes to the markup of a control and there is no way, nor is there a reason, for the control to distinguish what those tags might be.
trans-unit.target: Puede agregar un desarrollador de páginas `meta:` atributos para el marcado de un control y no existe ninguna forma, ni tampoco existe una razón para el control distinguir cuál podrían ser esas etiquetas.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if your control designer provides a way to edit complex properties or formats before applying changes to a page, you would create a clone of the control, pass both the original control and the clone to this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RegisterClone%2A> method, and then, when the changes are persisted to the tag, all `meta:` attributes are also persisted.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, si el Diseñador de controles proporciona una manera de editar propiedades complejas o formatos antes de aplicar cambios a una página, crear un clon del control, pase el control original y el clon a este <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RegisterClone%2A> (método), y, a continuación, cuando los cambios se conservan en la etiqueta, todas las `meta:` atributos también se guardan.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="original" /> is null.
-or-
<paramref name="clone" /> is null.
Gets the control designer for the Web Forms page that contains the associated control.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner" /> object that can be used at design time to access components on the Web Forms page that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner" /> objeto que puede utilizarse en tiempo de diseño para componentes de acceso en la página de formularios Web Forms que contiene el control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> property represents the control designer for the Web Forms page that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> propiedad representa el Diseñador de controles de la página de formularios Web Forms que contiene el control.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> property to access and manipulate the containing Web Forms page at design time.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> propiedad para tener acceso y manipular la página de formularios Web Forms contenedora en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: An editable design region contained within the control.
The content to assign for the editable design region.
Specifies the content for an editable region of the control at design time.

Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class can support region-based editing on the design surface and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method to set the content for a specified region.
trans-unit.target: Las clases que derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase admiten la edición basada en la región en la superficie de diseño y reemplazan el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> método para establecer el contenido de una región especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to get a reference to the design host, and then use the reference to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser> object that turns `content` into an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface and assigns the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> instance to the appropriate view.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo obtener una referencia al host de diseño y, a continuación, usar dicha referencia para crear un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser> objeto que activa `content` en una instancia de la <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interfaz y asigna el <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> de instancia para el vista apropiada.

trans-unit.source: An editable design region contained within the design-time view of the control.
The content to assign for the editable design region.
Specifies the content for an editable region in the design-time view of the control.
Normally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetRegionContent%2A> method is not overridden in derived designers.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetRegionContent%2A> método no se reemplaza en los diseñadores derivados.

trans-unit.source: The base class causes the design host to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method for the region.
trans-unit.target: La clase base hace que el host de diseño llamar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> método para la región.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetRegionContent%2A> method when custom data is required for the control before calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetRegionContent%2A> método cuando los datos personalizados son necesarios para el control antes de llamar a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetRegionContent%2A> method to insert HTML markup into a region of the control.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetRegionContent%2A> método para insertar código HTML en una región del control.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags" /> value.
<see langword="true" /> to set the flag, <see langword="false" /> to remove the flag.
Assigns the specified bitwise <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags" /> enumeration to the specified flag value.
There are several flags that can be set.
trans-unit.target: Hay varias marcas que se pueden establecer.

trans-unit.source: For example, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete> value of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property for the control designer, instead of the obsolete <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> método para establecer el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete> valor del elemento actual <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> propiedad del Diseñador de controles, en lugar de la obsoleta <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> method to indicate that the template is in editing mode.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.SetViewFlags%2A> método para indicar que la plantilla está en modo de edición.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object representing the HTML markup element for the associated control.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> object that represents the HTML markup element for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> objeto que representa el elemento de marcado HTML para el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property is used only for communication between the design host and the control designer and is not used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> propiedad se usa solo para la comunicación entre el host de diseño y el Diseñador de controles y no se utiliza por los programadores de controles.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es un <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> vacío

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a control designer class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo crear una clase de diseñador de controles que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: This control designer supports a control with four possible templates.
trans-unit.target: Este diseñador de controles admite un control con cuatro plantillas posibles.

trans-unit.source: To try it, compile the code, and then, in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], view the page in Design view.
trans-unit.target: Para probarlo, compile el código y, a continuación, en un diseño de host como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], ver la página en la vista Diseño.

trans-unit.source: Select the control, click the action list to select a template to modify, and then use the drag-and-drop feature to move controls into the template.
trans-unit.target: Seleccione el control, haga clic en la lista de acciones para seleccionar una plantilla que desee modificar y, a continuación, utiliza la característica de arrastrar y colocar para mover controles a la plantilla.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups" /> collection directly, or you can leave it unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Puede modificar el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups" /> colección directamente o se puede dejar sin cambios.

trans-unit.source: If you are overriding the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups" /> property, call the base implementation before you add template groups to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Si va a reemplazar el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups" /> propiedad, llame a la implementación base antes de agregar grupos de plantillas a la colección.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the design-time HTML markup for the associated Web server control by calling the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> method.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> method is called by the design host to update the display of the associated Web server control at design time, such as when the control has been modified.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> método se llama por el host de diseño para actualizar la presentación del control de servidor Web asociado en tiempo de diseño, por ejemplo, cuando se ha modificado el control.

trans-unit.source: Also, a control designer can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> method after modifying values of the control to update the display of the control.
trans-unit.target: Además, puede llamar un diseñador de controles el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> método después de modificar los valores del control para actualizar la presentación del control.

trans-unit.source: If you are calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event, or using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> object to set properties, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> method for you.
trans-unit.target: Si se está llamando a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> eventos, o mediante el <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> objeto para establecer las propiedades, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> llamadas de la interfaz el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to respond to a `Click` event in a control designer to change the focus between regions in a multi-region control and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to update the appearance of the control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo responder a una `Click` evento en un diseñador de controles para cambiar el foco entre las regiones en un control de varias regiones y usar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UpdateDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para actualizar la apariencia del control en el host de diseño.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo más extenso de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> clase.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control designer uses a temporary preview control to generate the design-time HTML markup.

<see langword="true" />, if the control designer uses a temporary copy of the control for design-time preview; otherwise, <see langword="false" />, if the control designer uses the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component" /> property for the control contained in the control designer.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, si el diseñador de control utiliza una copia temporal del control para la vista previa en tiempo de diseño; en otro caso, <see langword="false" />, si el diseñador de control utiliza la propiedad <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component" /> para el control contenido en el diseñador de control.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns a temporary copy of the control.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propiedad es `true`, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> propiedad devuelve una copia temporal del control.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted to the document.
trans-unit.target: Cambios en el control temporal no se conservan en el documento.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property for the control.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propiedad es `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> propiedad devuelve una instancia de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> propiedad para el control.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the instance of the control are persisted.
trans-unit.target: Se conservan los cambios en la instancia del control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> object is used to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> en el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> objeto se usa para establecer el valor de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting determines the type of control that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> configuración determina el tipo de control que se devuelve por la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> propiedad de la base de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> is not specified in the control designer declaration, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> object behavior is equivalent to specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property as `false`.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> no se especifica en la declaración del Diseñador de control, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> comportamiento de los objetos es equivalente a especificar la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propiedad como `false`.

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> class can override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property and ignore the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Los diseñadores personalizados que se derivan de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> clase puede invalidar la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> propiedad y pasar por alto la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Generally, to indicate that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl" /> property always returns a temporary copy of the control, override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property to always return <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Por lo general, para indicar que la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl" /> propiedad siempre devuelve una copia temporal del control, invalide el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> propiedad que se devuelva siempre <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: To indicate that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl" /> property always returns an instance of the control, override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property to always return <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Para indicar que la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl" /> propiedad siempre devuelve una instancia del control, invalide el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> propiedad que se devuelva siempre <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PreviewControlDesigner" /> class derives from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> and always returns <see langword="true" /> for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PreviewControlDesigner" /> clase se deriva de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> y siempre devuelve <see langword="true" /> para el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Web server control that can be used for previewing the design-time HTML markup.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object used by the base class to generate design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> objeto utilizado por la clase base para generar el marcado HTML en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to determine its return value.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> propiedad utiliza la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propiedad para determinar su valor devuelto.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns a temporary copy of the control.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propiedad es `true`, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> propiedad devuelve una copia temporal del control.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: Cambios en el control temporal no se conservan.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property for the control.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propiedad es `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> propiedad devuelve una instancia de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> propiedad para el control.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the instance of the control are persisted.
trans-unit.target: Se conservan los cambios en la instancia del control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> object is used to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> en el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> objeto se usa para establecer el valor de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting determines the type of control that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> configuración determina el tipo de control que se devuelve por la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> propiedad de la base de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> is not specified in the control designer declaration, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> object behavior is equivalent to specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property as `false`.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> no se especifica en la declaración del Diseñador de control, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> comportamiento de los objetos es equivalente a especificar la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propiedad como `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to mark a control designer with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo marcar un diseñador de controles con el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> atributo.

trans-unit.source: The code example derives a Web server control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> class and associates the control with a custom control designer implementation.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código deriva un control de servidor Web de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> clase y asocia el control a una implementación del Diseñador de control personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The control designer class declaration is marked with the `SupportsPreviewControl` attribute set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: La declaración de clase de diseñador de control se marca con la `SupportsPreviewControl` atributo establecido en `true`.

trans-unit.source: The control designer overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method, and then displays the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A> property of the control in italic at design time.
trans-unit.target: El Diseñador de control reemplaza el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método y, a continuación, muestra la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A> propiedad del control en cursiva en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <see langword="View" /> control has been created for display on the design surface.
<see langword="true" />, if a control has been created for viewing on the design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, si se ha creado un control para su visualización en la superficie de diseño; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control is visible at design time.
<see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> en todos los casos.
